core:assignAction.core:comment: Default to page 1 to display most recent item

core:dataAssignment.fromExpression: indexOf(sORReturnItemsList, selectedRow) %listCriteria.pageInfo.rowCount==listCriteria.pageInfo.rowCount-1 || size(sORReturnItemsList) == (indexOf(sORReturnItemsList, selectedRow) + 1)? sORReturnItemsList[indexOf(sORReturnItemsList, selectedRow)]: sORReturnItemsList[indexOf(sORReturnItemsList, selectedRow) + 1]
